Title: We're the Millers
Overview: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
production_companies: New Line Cinema, BenderSpink, Heyday Films, Newman/Tooley Films, Vincent Newman Entertainment, Slap Happy Productions (II)
Cast: Jason Sudeikis, Jennifer Aniston, Will Poulter
